amendment.description: To rename the United States-China Security Review Commission as the United States-China Economic and Security Review Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 166, as previously agreed to, was further modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 166 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 166 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To rename the United States-China Security Review Commission as the United States-China Economic and Security Review Commission, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 166 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 166 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Byrd.
